title: A1708 2017 00840 SSD ISSUE
message:
Hello

The computer boots up and works fine with charger connected, if charger disconnected the computer wont boot and it shows the folder on the screen. 
I know might be the issue with these SSDs. This one also needs battery replacement. My questions are, 

1. If i replace the battery for a "Status: normal" one, will I still see the folder problem when not connected to charger?

2. is this SSD reliable? Could it present more issues in the future? 


Gracias!!

title: A1708 2017 00840 SSD ISSUE
message:
These SSDs seem to have a problem with internal power generation, when battery level goes down.
So status battery reported by macOS, doesn't really matter.

title: A1708 2017 00840 SSD ISSUE
message:
The issue persist with the battery charged. 

Any comment on the other questions?

title: A1708 2017 00840 SSD ISSUE
message:
Test with another SSD.

Getting an adapter to M2 may be another option.
Be aware, some of them may generate more damage; don't buy the cheapest.
